column2: an A.M. Eatery////The wait was not very long to get seated
column3: granted it was a Monday...but there was a steady flow of people. Our waiter
column4: Darius did a wonderful job mixing some perfect juice drinks for us
column5: and the food so worth it!! I ordered the plain blueberry pancake and it was plenty. My mom ordered egg tacos (Juan's - can't remember the whole name) and they were incredible. Amazing service and atmosphere
column6: sad I didn't try the coffee
